meanings.definition: A person who practices or advocates minimalism.
meanings.sent1: Many minimalists prefer to live with only the essentials.
meanings.sent2: The minimalists in our group always inspire me to declutter.
meanings.sent3: The minimalist decided to donate all their excess belongings to charity.
meanings.sent4: She was a true minimalist, finding joy in simplicity.
meanings.sent5: The minimalist lifestyle promotes a clutter-free environment.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of minimalism.
meanings.sent1: The room had a minimalist design with clean lines and neutral colors.
meanings.sent2: Her minimalist approach to decorating created a sense of calm.
meanings.sent3: The minimalist artwork was praised for its simplicity and elegance.
meanings.sent4: His minimalist style of writing conveyed deep emotions with few words.
meanings.sent5: The minimalist aesthetic focused on functionality over excess decoration.
